description: Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites you to join SSC's Cyber Security Industry Day. The event will take place on January 25th 2024 between 14:00-15:00 (ET)
full_summary:
================================obook====================

***Government Tender Announcement***

* **Title (EN)**: Shared Services Canada's (SSC) Cyber Security Industry Day
* **Title (FR)**: Journée de l'industrie de la cybersécurité des Services partagés Canada (SPC)

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: CB-734-6875992
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Solicitation Number**: CSID2023-24
* **Publication Date**: November 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 1, 2023, 5:00 pm ET (Expired)

### Event Details

Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites interested organizations to attend its Cyber Security Industry Day on January 25, 2024, from 2:00 pm to 3:00 pm ET. The event aims to provide a platform for industry stakeholders to engage with SSC's cyber security program.

### Registration and Participation

To attend, please register by providing the following information to the email enterprisevendorengagement-engagementdesfournisseurs@ssc-spc.gc.ca by December 1, 2023, 5:00 pm ET:

* Subject: Cyber Security Industry Day
* Company name
* Attendee names and contact information
* Accessibility requirements (if required)

After registration, you will receive a link to the meeting and presentation material no later than January 24, 2024.

### Important Contacts

* **Contact Person**: Josee Green, [josee.green@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:josee.green@ssc-spc.gc.ca), phone: (506) 875-4046
* **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada (SSC), 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa, ON, Canada K1P 0B6

### Additional Information

Please note that this tender is non-competitive and not applicable to any trade agreements. The regions of opportunity, regions of delivery, and contracting entity are within Canada. The notice URL and attachment can be found at:

* EN: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25052/agenda_cyber-security-program-industry-day-en.pdf
* FR: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25052/agenda_cybersécurité-programme-Industry-Journéed-fr.pdf
